description:
A young woman visits RPG Real Estate, looking for a property that she can live in with her pet. However, the pet isn`t exactly the type one usually keeps in an apartment.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Always Together! A Property Packed with Pets, Dreams, and Friendship!
Zutto Issho! Pet to Yume to Yuujou no, Gyutto Tsumatta Oheya Desu!
ずっと一緒! ペットと夢と友情の, ぎゅっとつまったお部屋です!
